title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Distributed Learning Object Economics and Adaptive Design for Math Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Students can select contextually appropriate mathematical content (e.g., geometry, fractions, measurement) using a distributed learning object retrieval system (LORSE).
Learners can optimize content placement in individual learning designs using a microcontext-based placement tool (LOOK).
Learners can diagnose their learning gaps by analyzing formative assessment data and match personalized supplementary materials with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
